text: Solvang is a city in Santa Barbara County, California. It was founded in 1884. It became a city in 1985. It had a population of 6,126 in 2020. Solvang means "sunny fields" in Danish. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Santa Barbara County, California Category:1884 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in California
title: Solvang, California
